meanings.sent1: She hollos for her dog when it runs away.
meanings.sent2: The coach hollos instructions to the players during the game.
meanings.sent3: The children hollos with excitement when they see the ice cream truck.
meanings.sent4: The protesters hollos for justice in the streets.
meanings.sent5: His voice hollos across the valley, echoing in the distance.

meanings.sent1: The hunter's hollos echoed through the forest.
meanings.sent2: The sudden hollos startled the birds in the trees.
meanings.sent3: The audience erupted in hollos of approval at the end of the performance.
meanings.sent4: The hollos of the fans filled the stadium with excitement.
meanings.sent5: The distant hollos of the hikers could be heard in the quiet wilderness.
